books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A man imprisoned for murdering his 3-year-old son becomes convinced his son is still alive and plans an escape.
books.name: I WILL FIND YOU

books.author: by Ann Napolitano
books.description: In a homage to Louisa May Alcott’s “Little Women,” a young man’s dark past resurfaces as he gets to know the family of his college sweetheart.
books.name: HELLO BEAUTIFUL

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.
books.name: IT STARTS WITH US

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.
books.name: DAISY JONES & THE SIX

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover and Tarryn Fisher
books.description: Questions arise when a pair of lovers try to uncover why they suddenly became strangers.
books.name: NEVER NEVER

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: After an unexpected death prevents her from going to Penn State and and forces her to move in with her absent father, Beyah Grim has a summer fling with the rich guy next door.
books.name: HEART BONES

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Gabrielle Zevin
books.description: Two friends find their partnership challenged in the world of video game design.
books.name: TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW

books.author: by Jenny Jackson
books.description: Three women navigate their roles in a well-to-do family living in Brooklyn Heights.
books.name: PINEAPPLE STREET

books.author: by Lucy Score
books.description: The second book in the Knockemout series. A woman with some secrets and the chief of police have different ideas about where things are headed.
books.name: THINGS WE HIDE FROM THE LIGHT

books.author: by C.J. Box
books.description: The 23rd book in the Joe Pickett series. Joe and Nate might be on opposite sides for the first time.
books.name: STORM WATCH
